text_show: Ghana Ghana yɛ ɔman wɔ Abibimam. Kane no na yɛ frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ahenkro de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beye Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire. Ghana ye ɔman a wonyaa faahodie kane wo Abibirem nyinaa wo Obubuo da a eto so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yenyaa faahodie no ne Osaagyefuo Dokta Kwaie Nkrumah. Nkuro akese no bi ne Kumase, Cape Coast, Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ne Takorade. Kumasi ye Asantefuo ahenkuro. Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei$Tutu Oto So Mmienu (II)ene Ohenpon a seisei ote Asika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) suo.Ghana wo mantam beye du. Ɔman Panyin a odi Ghana so seisei no de Owura John Evans Atta Mills. Ghanafo pe asomdwee na wo san ye nkrofo a wo suro nyame. Nkuro no president edi kan no, na ye fre no Kwame Nkrumah. Ono ne ma, yen Ghanafwo nye yesase se eye yen ye dia.

Mose —Ɔbarima a Ne Gyidi Yɛ Den DƐN NE GYIDI? Sɛ Bible ka “gyidi” a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ obi wɔ adanse a edi mũ wɔ biribi ho, enti ogye tom. Sɛ obi wɔ Onyankopɔn mu gyidi a, ɔwɔ ahotoso sɛ ne bɔhyɛ nyinaa bɛba mu. DƐN NA MOSE DE KYERƐE SƐ ƆWƆ GYIDI? Mose de n’adwene nyinaa sii Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ ahorow so. (Genesis 22:15-18) Ná anka Mose betumi adi yiye wɔ Egypt, nanso wamfa n’adwene ankɔ so, na mmom “ɔpawee sɛ ɔbɛma wɔatan ɔne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo ani mmom sen sɛ obenya bɔne mu anigye bere tiaa bi.” (Hebrifo
..........
i hyɛɛ ne kuromfo no gyidi den anaa? Otumi yɛe, efisɛ Bible ka Mose ne Israelfo nyinaa ho asɛm sɛ: “Gyidi nti wɔfaa Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu te sɛ nea wɔnam asase kesee so.” (Hebrifo 11:29) Mose nyaa ne gyidi so akatua, na obiara a ɔwɔ saa gyidi no bi nso benya so akatua. DƐN NA YESUA FI MU? Yebetumi asuasua Mose na yɛde yɛn adwene nyinaa asi Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ so. Ɛho nhwɛso ni: Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn bɔ sɛ, sɛ yɛde ne som di kan wɔ yɛn asetenam a, ɔno nso de nea yehia bɛma yɛn. (Mateo 6:33) Ɛnnɛ, honam fam n

Ɔdi “maanle biala, aneɛ biala, abusua ekpunli biala nee menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti anwo zo” tumi, yemɔti ɔle kpole ɔtɛla maanle ko anu arane.—Yekile 13:7. (Edwɛndolɛ 2:2) Eza bɛbaha bɛ sogyama bɛabɔ nu kɛ bɛ nee Nyamenle ɛlɔnema mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese a li bɛ ti la kaho wɔ Amagɛdɔn, noko bɛbazɛkye maanle maanle ne mɔ wɔ konle ɛhye anu.—Yekile 16:14, 16; 19:19, 20. “Mɛne bulu nee adile nsuu” Bɛfa nɔma bie mɔ bɛdi gyima wɔ sɛkɛlɛneɛ adenle zo wɔ Baebolo ne anu. Adɛn Nti na Obi Kɔ Asɔre Mpo a, Mosan Kɔ Ne Nkyɛn? Yɛahu sɛ nnipa pii wɔ hɔ a, wɔwɔ asɔre a wɔkɔ, nanso wɔn ani gye ho sɛ wɔne yɛn bɛyɛ Bible mu mpɛɛpɛɛmu. Yegye tom sɛ obiara wɔ hokwan sɛ ɔkyerɛ ɔsom a ɔpɛ, enti yɛnhyɛ nkurɔfo sɛ wontie yɛn asɛm no. Sɛ yɛne nkurɔfo reka ɔsom ho asɛm a, yɛde Bible afotu yɛ dwuma, enti yɛyɛ no “ odwo” so, na yɛma wohu sɛ ‘ yebu’ wɔn paa. (1 Petro 3: Obi wɔ hɔ a, ebia da a yɛkɔɔ ne nkyɛn no, na onni adagyew, nanso ebia ɔkyena de, obenya adagyew ne yɛabɔ nkɔmmɔ. Ɛtɔ da nso a, asɛm tumi to obi, na etumi ma otie Bible mu asɛm. Enti yɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ yɛne nkurɔfo bɛkasa mpɛn pii.

Bible Nsɛmmisa Ho Mmuae Dɛn na ɛbɛboa mmɔfra ama wɔadɔ Onyankopɔn? Sɛ wo mma bɛdɔ Onyankopɔn a, gye sɛ wɔhu biribi a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn te ase na ɔdɔ wɔn. Sɛ wɔbɛnya ɔdɔ ama Onyankopɔn a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhu no yie. (1 Yohane 4:8) Nneɛma a ɛhia sɛ wɔnya ho mmuaeɛ no bi ni: Dɛn nti na Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa? Adɛn nti na Onyankopɔn ma amanehunu kɔ so? Dɛn na Onyankopɔn bɛyɛ ama yɛn daakye? Wopɛ sɛ wo mma dɔ Onyankopɔn a, ma wɔnhu sɛ wo nso wodɔ no. Ɛba saa a, wɔbɛsuasua wo. Wobɛyɛ dɛn akyerɛkyerɛ wo mma a

ɔn koma? Onyankopɔn Asɛm wɔ tumi. (Hebrifoɔ 4:12) Enti boa wo mma ma wɔnnya mu nteaseɛ a ɛfata. Sɛ Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ a, na ɔtaa bisa wɔn nsɛm sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a asɛm no bɛka wɔn koma. Afei nso na ɔtie wɔn na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ Twerɛnsɛm mu kyerɛ wɔn. Sɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ bɛka wo mma koma a, ɛsɛ sɛ wosua akwan a Yesu faa so kyerɛkyerɛeɛ no. Dɛn ne Onyankopɔn Ahenni? Nea Bible ka Onyankopɔn Ahenni yɛ aban ankasa a Yehowa Nyankopɔn de asi hɔ. Esiane sɛ “ Onyankopɔn Ahenni” di tumi fi soro nti, Bible san frɛ no “ ɔsoro ahenni.” (Marko 1:14, 15; Mateo 4:17) Onyankopɔn Ahenni no ne nnipa ahenni di nsɛ wɔ nneɛma pii mu, nanso Onyankopɔn Ahenni no sen aban foforɔ biara. Ahemfo. Onyankopɔn apaw Yesu Kristo sɛ Ahenni no so hene, na wama Yesu tumi a ɛkyɛn wiase ahemfo nyinaa deɛ. (Mateo 28:18) Tumi a Yesu anya no, ade pa nko ara na ɔde bɛyɛ

Adɛn Nti na Munni Easter? Nsɛm a nkurɔfo ka to yɛn so Nea nkurɔfo ka: Yehowa Adansefo nyɛ Kristofo nti na wonni Easter no. Nokwasɛm: Yegye di sɛ Yesu Kristo ne yɛn Agyenkwa, enti yɛbɔ yɛn ho mmɔden paa di “ n’anammɔn akyi pɛɛ.” Nea nkurɔfo ka: Munnye nni sɛ wonyanee Yesu fii awufo mu. Nokwasɛm: Yegye di sɛ Yesu nyan fii awufo mu; yenim sɛ obi ntumi nka sɛ ɔyɛ Kristoni bere a onnye saa asɛm no nni, enti yɛka ho asɛm paa wɔ yɛn asɛnka adwuma no mu. n nti na Yehowa Adansefo nni Easter? Easter nni Bible mu. Yesu anka sɛ yɛnkae ne wusɔre, na mmom ose yɛnkae ne wu. Bere a Bible ka sɛ Yesu wui no, saa bere no pɛpɛɛpɛ na yɛkae ne wu no afe biara. —Luka 22: 19, 20. Yegye di sɛ abawo ne nnɔbae ho amanne a na ɛwɔ hɔ tete no, emu na Easter fi bae. Ɛno nti Onyankopɔn mpɛ sɛ yedi Easter. ‘ Ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔne obi bɛkyɛ ɔsom a yɛde ma no’ no, na okyi sɛ yɛde nneyɛe a n’ani nnye ho bɛfrafra ne som. —Exodus 20:5; 1 Ahene 18:21. EDWƐKƐ TITILE Awie Kola Nwu Kenlebie Ɔ? Yɛ muala yɛdwenle kenlebie anwo. Yɛdwenle kɛzi yɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nee yɛ alɔvolɛ ɛdeɛ bayɛ wɔ kenlebie la anwo. Yɛbiza kpuyia mɔɔ le kɛ ɛhye mɔ la kɛ: ‘Asoo me mra banyia ewiade kpalɛ nu adɛnla? Esiane bie bazɛkye azɛlɛ ye ɔ? Asoo debie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ mebahola meahakyi ye kɛkala na meanyia kenlebie kpalɛ ɔ?’ Yɛle menli mɔɔ yɛkulo kɛ yɛnwu debie; yɛkpondɛ kɛ yɛnyia anwodozo, yɛsi pi, yɛnyia ngyehyɛleɛ nee banebɔlɛ. Twi Twi ye Kasa wכ Ghana man mu. Nipa beye pepepem nson na eka Twi Kasa wכ Ghana. Ghanafoכ wכ kasa ahoroכ beberee. Twi ka Akan Kasa abusua a yefre no Kwa Kasa Abusua no ho. Twi gu mu ahoroכ pii nanso ne nyinaa ye kasa baako a obiara te ase. Yewכ Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Akyem Twi ene nea ekeka ho. Twi a, yeka daadaa no nteasee nye na. Ɛno akyiri no, yewכ mme ne akasakoa a, ewכ se obi de n'adwene kכ akyiri ansa na wate asee. Wope se woka obi anim asem wכ abere a, wompe se wofom no a, wobu no be. Nti na mpaninfoכ bu be bi se: "כba nyansafoכ, yebu no be, na yennka no asem". Kasakoa ye asem a, ne nkyereasee enna tee. Ne saa nti no obi a, n'ani mfiriie no rente asee. Yemfa no se, obi awu, na ne ba ketewa wכ hכ na wompe se כbe te se n'awofoכ awu a, woka no se: "asemasi adane n'ani ahwe dan", anaa se, "asemasi aka nkyene agu". Ɛtoaso bio, yeka kasakoa de anidie ma obi a, odi nim. Ɛno nti, se כhene wu a, yeka se: "Nana kכ ne kra akyi".

Kamfo Agyenkwa Nyankopɔn 1Kamfo Awurade! Me kra, kamfo Awurade! 2 Meda so te ase yi, mɛkamfo no. Mɛto me Nyankopɔn dwom me nkwa nna nyinaa. 3 Mommfa mo ho nnto ahemfo so efisɛ, onipa rentumi nnye wo. 4 Sɛ wowu a, wɔsan kɔ mfutuma mu; saa da no wɔn nsusuwii nyinaa ba n’awiei. 5 Nhyira nka nea ɔwɔ Yakob Nyankopɔn sɛ ne boafo, na ɔde ne ho to n’awurade ne ne Nyankopɔn, 6 nea ɔbɔɔ soro, asase ne ɛpo ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa no so no. Odi ne bɔhyɛ so daa. 7 Odi ma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so, na ɔma wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn nso aduan. Awurade gyaa nneduafo 8 na ɔma anifuraefo hu ade. Ɔma wɔn a wɔahwe ase so. Ɔdɔ n’atreneefo. 9 Ɔbɔ ahɔho a wɔte yɛn asase so ho ban. Ɔboa akunafo ne nyisaa na mmom ɔsɛe amumɔyɛfo nsusuwii. 10 Awurade yɛ ɔhene daa daa. Wo Nyankopɔn, O Sion, bedi hene daa nyinaa. Kamfo Awurade.

Nnipa abɔnefo no wuwui. Abɔfo atuatewfo no yii nipadua a wɔde duraa wɔn ho no gui, na wɔbɛyɛɛ adaemone. Wɔn a na wɔwɔ adaka no mu no nyaa wɔn ti didii mu. Ɛwom sɛ bere bi akyi no, Noa ne n’abusua wuwui de, nanso Onyankopɔn benyan wɔn ma wɔabɛtena ase daa. Onyankopɔn bɛsɛe abɔnefo, bio na wagye atreneefo nkwa. Mateo 24:37-39 Satan ne adaemone no da so ara redaadaa nnipa. Nnipa pii po akwankyerɛ a Yehowa fi ɔdɔ mu de ma nnɛ no sɛnea Noa bere sofo yɛe no. Ɛrenkyɛ, Yehowa bɛsɛe abɔnefo nyinaa.—2 Petro 2:5, 6. Nnipa binom te sɛ Noa. Wotie Onyankopɔn na wɔyɛ nea ɔka kyerɛ wɔn; wɔne Yehowa Adansefo.

Onyankopɔn na Ɔma Yɛhu Amane Anaa? Nea Bible ka Bible ka no pen sɛ, ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma yɛhu amane! Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa no, wammɔ amanehunu anka ho. Mmom no, awarefo a wɔdii kan no sɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn tumidi na wɔpaw sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nea wɔn ankasa pɛ. Wɔtwee wɔn ho fii Onyankopɔn ho, na wɔnyaa ho nsunsuanso bɔne. Gyinae bɔne a wɔsii no, ɛno na nnɛ ama yɛrebrɛ yi. Enti ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma nnipa hu amane. Bible ka sɛ: “ Sɛ sɔhwɛ to obi a, ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔka sɛ: ‘Onyankopɔn na ɔresɔ me ahwɛ.’ Efisɛ wontumi mfa nnebɔne nsɔ Onyankopɔn nhwɛ, na ɔno nso nsɔ obiara nhwɛ.” (Yakobo 1:13) Onipa biara tumi hu amane. Nnipa a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn anim dom no mpo, wɔtumi hu amane.

Part 2 Who Is the True God? Nyameɛpiri komapɛ yeɛ ɔwɔ berɛ ɔ. Ye dumaa yeɛ ole Yehowa. Bible ne kã kyɛ: “Na mmenia nwui kyɛ wɔbɔ wodumaa yeɛ ole Yehowa nen, wɔngome yeɛ ɛte piri wɔ anwuro ne aseɛ mukoraati so ɔ.” (Edwein 83:18, NWT) Ɔte honhom; yɛngɔhora ngonwui. Ɔdɔ yɛ, na ɔpena kyɛ yɛkoso yɛdɔ ye bie. Ɔpena kyɛ yɛdɔ afoforɛ koso. (Mateo 22:35-40) Ye yeɛ ɔte Pumbuniɛ bɔ ɔbɔle nningyein mukoraati ɔ. Nyameɛpiri abɔdeɛ bɔ oli moa ne te honhom bɔ ole tumi, na yesi ne bɛɛfrɛle ye Yesu Kristo. Yehowa sa bɔle abɔfoɛ. Yehowa yeɛ ɔbɔle nikyee biala wɔ anwuro . . . ne aseɛ so ɔ. Nyekyire 4:11 Yehowa yeɛ ɔbɔle nzramaa, aseɛ, ne bɔ ɔwɔ so biala ɔ. Ɔfale aseɛ nwo nnɛterɛ bɔle sona bɔ oli moa ne, Adam.

Yesu Wu Nkaedi Yɛrefrɛ wo sɛ bra bɛka yɛn ho ma yɛnkae Yesu wu no. Hwehwɛ baabi a ɛbɛn wo a wubetumi akɔ bi. Yɛreto Nsa Afrɛ Wo Ade rebɛkye ma Yesu awu no, ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no anadwo no sɛ wɔnkae afɔre a na ɔrebɛbɔ no. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔ so nyɛ eyi mfa nkae me.” Yɛbɛkae Yesu wu no Dwoda, April 14, 2014 bere a owia akɔtɔ. Yehowa Adansefo reto nsa afrɛ wo ne w’abusuafo ne wo nnamfo sɛ mommetie ɔkasa tiawa bi a wɔbɛma no saa da no. Ɔkasa a wɔbɛma no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ nea enti a Yesu wu no ho hia paa no mu. Yɛbɛyɛ dwumadi yi wɔ baabi a ɛbɛn wo. Wɔn a wɔbɛba no rentua hwee.

Ghana Ghana yɛ ɔman wɔ Abibimam. Kane no na yɛ frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ahenkro de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beye Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire. Ghana ye ɔman a wonyaa faahodie kane wo Abibirem nyinaa wo Obubuo da a eto so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yenyaa faahodie no ne Osaagyefuo Dokta Kwame Nkrumah. Nkuro akese no bi ne Kumase, Cape Coast, Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ne Takorade. Kumasi ye Asantefuo ahenkuro. Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei$Tutu Oto So Mmienu (II)ene Ohenpon a seisei ote Asika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) suo.Ghana wo mantam beye du. Ɔman Panyin a odi Ghana so seisei no de Owura John Evans Atta Mills. Ghanafo pe asomdwee na wo san ye nkrofo a wo suro nyame. Nkuro no mampanyini edi kan no, na ye fre no Kwame Nkrumah. Ono ne ma, yen Ghanafwo nye yesase se eye yen ye dia.

Jacques Lefèvre d’Étaples (Latin, Jacobus Faber Stapulensis) yɛ Bible asekyerɛfo. Ɔboaa ɔmanfo ma wotumi kenkanee Bible wɔ kasa foforo mu. Akyiri yi ɔkyerɛw ne yɔnko ber
..........

Aware Dodow Ye? Nea Bible ka Tete no, Onyankopɔn maa kwan maa mmarima ware boroo baako. (Genesis 4:19; 16:1-4; 29:18-29) Nanso, ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma wɔfii aware dodow ase. Adam sei, Onyankopɔn maa no ɔbea baako pɛ. Onyankopɔn maa Yesu Kristo de aware ho mmara a na ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw no sii hɔ bio. (Yohane 8:28) Nnipa bi kɔbisaa Yesu aware ho asɛm bi, na ɔkaa sɛ: “ Onii a ɔbɔɔ wɔn no yɛɛ wɔn ɔbarima ne ɔbea fii mfiase, na ɔkae sɛ, ‘Eyi nti na ɔbarima begyaw ne papa ne ne maame hɔ na wakɔfam ne yere ho, na wɔn baanu no ayɛ ɔhonam koro.’” Akyiri yi, Onyankopɔn de honhom kaa Yesu asuafo no baako ma ɔkyerɛwee sɛ: “ Ɔbarima biara nnya n’ankasa ne yere, na ɔbea biara nnya n’ankasa ne kunu.” (1 Korintofo 7:2) Bible san ka sɛ ɔbarima biara, ansa na wɔde hokwan ahorow bi bɛma no wɔ Kristofo asafo mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ “ okunu a ne yere yɛ biako.”

Asoo Nyamenle Dua Esiane Zo Twe Yɛ Nzo? Baebolo Ne Bua Kɛ Baebolo ne ɛngilehile kɛ Nyamenle dua esiane mɔɔ sisi la azo twe yɛ nzo. Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ mɔɔ wɔ Baebolo ne anu la le ngakyile fi esiane mɔɔ sisi la anwo. Nyamenle nea edwɛkɛ ne amuala na yeazi kpɔkɛ. Baebolo ne ka kɛ: “ Dasanli nea sonla ɛnyelɛ zo ala, na mame, menea sonla ahonle nu.” —1 Samoɛle 16:7. Gyihova nea mɔɔ wɔ awie ko biala ahonle nu la na ɔsɛkye mɔɔ ɔkɛnwu ye kɛ ɔle amumuyɛ la. —Mɔlebɛbo 18:23-32. Nyamenle dimoa bɔ kɔkɔ na ɔmaa menli mɔɔ bɛtie ye la nyia bɛ ti. Esiane ɛmbɔ kɔkɔ na yeazi na ɔku anzɛɛ ɔboda awie biala mɔɔ ɔnyɛ nyeyenu. Ɔyɛ a mɔɔ menli yɛ la boka nwo bie a esiane bie mɔ si a; kɛ neazo la bɛsi azua wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ azɛlɛkpusulɛ, azuyilɛ nee ninyɛne gyɛne kola si la. Sukoa Dɔɔnwo ƐZINZALƐ ARANE Esiane —Asoo Ɔkile Kɛ Nyamenle Ati Yɛ Se? Saa nɔhalɛ Nyamenle ne kyi atisesebɛyɛlɛ a, kɛmɔti a ɔmaa esiane ku menli mɔɔ bɛnze nwolɛ bie la ɛ?

ESUADZE 12 Ibesi Dɛn Atwe Epin Nyankopɔn? 1. Aso mpaabɔ nyina na Nyankopɔn tsie? Nyankopɔn to nsa frɛ nyimpa nyina dɛ wɔntwe mpin no wɔ mpaabɔ mu. (Ndwom 65:2) Naaso, nnyɛ mpaabɔ nyina na otsie. Dɛ nhwɛdo no, okun a ɔyɛ ne yer ayaayaadze no, ne mpaabɔ kwan botum esiw. (1 Peter 3:7) Bio so, Nyankopɔn enntsie Israelmba no hɔn mpaabɔ ber a wɔkɔr do yɛɛ ndzeyɛbɔn no. Hokwan a yeenya dze bɔ Jehovah mpaa no, ɔnnsɛ dɛ yebu no tootooba da. Sɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo mpo nya nnuho a, Nyankopɔn betsie hɔn mpaabɔ. 2.

Enuanom, mo ma yen sakyera y'adwene ne yen aberabo na ewieye mere no aben. Tweresem se, se Agyenkwah no beba a, aman besore etia aman so. Yeyi nyinaa kyere yen se emere no aben. Nyankopon ma yen enkwan daa. Beberee na wo ne won fitii asie, nanso wonni ho biom. Wodee Adom bi nti wo daso ti nkwam.Nyame ye, na oye ma yen daa! Nyame Nhyira wo.

Bere a Wo Hokafo Aka Baabi BIBLE ka no pefee sɛ: Okunu “nnɔ ne yere sɛ ne ho.” Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔbea nso ‘nya obu kɛse ma ne kunu.’ Wɔn nyinaa ka bom yɛ “ɔhonam koro.” (Efe. 5:33; Gen. 2:23, 24) Sɛ nnipa baanu ware a, ebedu baabi no sɛ obiako anhu ne yɔnko a, ontumi ntena. Saa bere no nyinaa na wɔn dɔ nyin ara na ɛrenyin. Nea yɛreka yi akɔyɛ sɛ nnua abien a esi faako renyin. Wobɛhwɛ na biako nhin abobare biako deɛ ho. Saa na ɛte wɔ aware mu. ƆFÃ 1 Yɛyɛ Dɛn Tie Onyankopɔn? Onyankopɔn nam Bible no so kasa kyerɛ yɛn. 2 Timoteo 3:16 Nokware Nyankopɔn no na ɔmaa nnipa kyerɛw n’asɛm wɔ nhoma kronkron bi mu. Saa nhoma no ne Bible. Nsɛm a ɛho hia a Onyankopɔn pɛ sɛ wuhu wɔ Bible no mu. Onyankopɔn nim nea eye ma yɛn, na ɔno na nyansa nyinaa fi no. Sɛ wutie no a, wubehu nyansa paa.—Mmebusɛm 1:5. Onyankopɔn pɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ asase so nyinaa kenkan Bible no. Seesei wɔatintim Bible no wɔ kasa horow pii mu. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wutie Onyankopɔn a, ɛnde ɛsɛ sɛ wokenkan Bible no na wote ase. Nnipa a wɔwɔ mmaa nyinaa retie. Mateo 28:19 Yehowa Adansefo betumi aboa wo ma woate Bible no ase. Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ Onyankopɔn ho nokwasɛm wɔ wiase nyinaa. Wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo kwa a wuntua sika biara. Afei wubetumi asua Onyankopɔn ho ade wɔ Yehowa Adansefo Ahenni Asa a ɛwɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ no mu.

ƆWƐN-ABAN June 2014 | Onyankopɔn Bu Sigaretnom Sɛn? Sɛ wuhu Onyankopɔn adwene wɔ sigaretnom ho a, ebetumi ama wagyae nom. ASƐM A ƐDA SO Sigaret Redi Nnipa Awu Adɛn nti na mmɔden a nnipa abɔ nyinaa akyi, sigaret da so ara di awu? ASƐM A ƐDA SO Sigaret —Onyankopɔn Bu no Sɛn? Bible nhyɛ da mmɔ sigaret anaa tawa din, enti yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ahu adwene a Onyankopɔn kura wɔ sigaret ho? Nkwa Paanoo No —Woaka Ahwɛ? Adɛn nti na Yesu kaa sɛ ɔno ne nkwa paanoo ne paanoo a efi soro? Anidaso Bɛn na Ɛwɔ Hɔ Ma Me Nananom a Wɔawuwu? Bible se Onyankopɔn benyan wɔn a wɔnteɛ mpo afi owu mu. Adɛn nti na ɔbɛyɛ saa? Tetefo Baasa a Wɔpɛɛ Nokware Akyi Kwan —Ekosii Sɛn? Biribi a Capito, Cellarius, ne Campanus nyinaa yɛe nti, Katolek Asɔre no ne nnipa a na wɔrepere ɔsom mu nsakrae ko tiaa wɔn. Bible Nsɛmmisa Ho Mmuae Nea enti a wɔbɔɔ asase no, ɛbɛba mu anaa? Nneɛma Foforo a Ɛwɔ Wɛbsaet Ha Onyankopɔn na Ɔma Yɛhu Amane Anaa? Onipa biara tumi hu amane. Nnipa a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn anim dom mpo, wɔtumi hu amane. Adɛn ntia?

Part 5 The Great Flood —Who Listened? Who Did Not? Nowa aberɛ sofoɛ ne pẽe yɛle bɔne. Genesis 6:5, NWT Adam ne Hawa wole mmaa, na sona yɛle pẽe wɔ aseɛ so. Yesi ne, abɔfoɛ ne bie tele atua bɛɛbokale Satan so. Bɛwale aseɛ he aso bɛɛfale sona anwonaen bedwirale bɛnwo, kyɛ bɔ bɛkɔhora bekogya mmrasua ɔ. Mmrasua ne wole mmaa bɔ bɛte sorongo, né bɛnwo yɛ se, na né bɛte keka. Aseɛ naso yɛle nnebɔneyɛfoɛ ngome. Bible ne kã kyɛ: “Sona fale bɔne yili aseɛ he aso, na né b’ahone nu nzusuleɛ te bɔne ngome.” Nowa tiele Nyameɛpiri na ɔyɛle alaka ne. Hebrifoɛ 11:7 Né Nowa te sona páa. Yehowa hã hyirɛle Nowa kyɛ Ɔbaafa nzueyilɛ bie basɛkye abɔnefoɛ. Nyameɛpiri sa hã hyirɛle Nowa kyɛ ɔyɛ alaka piri bie na ɔfa y’abusua ne ngaka ahoroɛ pẽe hɔ nu. Nowa bɔle mmenia ne kɔkɔ wɔ Nzueyilɛ bɔ né ɔ́ba nanwo, nakoso bandie. Ebiemɔ po serele Nowa; ebie koso pɔle ye. Nowa yiele alaka nen, ɔfale ngaka ne hɔle nu.
